title: Well, I Sure Love It: The Story of a Cum-Slut
description: Angela’s a sucker for a hard cock. But, as much as she loves one in her mouth, hubby doesn’t seem interested. Then her four girlfriends make her an offer she simply can’t refuse. If you like oral sex, getting it or giving it, this story will make you want it even more. It's time to enjoy this newly revised version.
author: Reese Cantwell
